FuncDef: This command binds a service to an existing Service Distribution Point (SDP).

ParaDef.Info: The SDP identifier. Allowed values are integers in the range of 1 and 17407 for existing SDPs.
The virtual circuit identifier. Values-1 to 4294967295.
The encapsulation and pseudowire type for the spoke-sdp. Values-ether: specifies Ethernet pseudowire as the type of virtual circuit (VC) associated with the SDP binding. ParamDefault: Default- ether

ExtraInfo: Default: No sdp-id is bound to a service.
